summary: The bill, titled the STEM Education and Skilled Technical Workforce for Fusion Act (or Fusion Workforce Act), aims to support fusion energy education and workforce development. It authorizes the National Science Foundation (NSF) and the Department of Energy (DOE) to award grants for various activities, including curriculum development, teacher training, research experiences, and industry partnerships. A 'Fusion Skilled Technical Workforce and STEM Education Coordination Hub' is also proposed to facilitate workforce development and coordination. The bill outlines authorized appropriations for both NSF and DOE for fiscal years 2026-2030.
